This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our services, including third-party services like Google, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom.
We use your information to ensure Proleven Whiz runs smoothly and meets your needs:
Your data is kept safe, and we never share it with unauthorized parties.

We use your information to ensure Proleven Whiz runs smoothly and meets your needs: Monitoring Activity : We use Google's audit reports to track attendance during online training via Google Meet, ensuring engagement and participation.
We prioritize protecting sensitive data through: Data Minimization : We collect only essential information and securely dispose of it when no longer needed.
We collect only the information needed to provide a smooth and efficient experience.

At the User's request, in addition to the information contained in this privacy policy, this Site may provide the User with additional and contextual information regarding specific Services, or the collection and processing of Personal Data.

The interactions and information acquired by this Site are in any case subject to the User's privacy settings relating to each social network.
These types of services allow for interactions with social networks, or other external platforms, directly from the pages of this Site.
We only request the permissions necessary to deliver these features.
